mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT PD.product_cd as product_cd, PD.prod_nm as prod_nm, LC.l_ct_nm as l_ct_nm, SP.supply_nm as supply_nm, WH.warehouse_nm as warehouse_nm, PD.purchase_price as purchase_price, PD.price as price FROM tb_scm_product PD LEFT JOIN tb_scm_m_category MC ON MC.m_ct_cd = PD.m_ct_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_l_category LC ON LC.l_ct_cd = MC.l_ct_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_supply SP ON SP.supply_cd = PD.supply_cd LEFT JOIN tb_scm_warehouse WH ON WH.warehouse_cd = PD.warehouse_cd LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
